During MTV’s 2015 VMAs Vanessa Hudgens stood out with her beautiful Naeem Khan gown and boho hairdo. We loved her romantic hairstyle so much we had to share how to get her look at home. Schwarzkopf celebrity hairstylist, Richard Collins, created Vanessa Hudgens’s bohemian chic, dreamy look.

How to get Vanessa Hudgens’s boho chic hair

Step 1: Start with dry hair; work in a protective hair spray for hot tools protection and initial shine. Collins used Schwarzkopf styliste Crystal Shine & Hold Heat Protection Shine Spray throughout Vanessa’s hair.

Step 2: Leaving a few thick pieces around the face, use an inch curling iron to begin creating soft, deconstructed waves. Prep and finish the curls with a spray such as Schwarzkopf styliste Ultime Biotin+ Volume & Texture H2O-Free Hair Spray for added texture and hold.

Step 3: Take the remaining pieces of hair left in the previous step and create a braid on either side of the face. Once complete, bring the braid to the opposite side of the face and secure above the ear with bobby pins. Repeat with remaining hair on other side of the face; creating a full braid crown. Apply a shine spray like Schwarzkopf styliste Ultime Crystal Shine & Hold Laminating Shine Hair Spray to secure the look.

Step 4: Dust Schwarzkopf essence Ultime Diamond Color & Radiance Shine Boost Tonic over the hair for added shine and glimmer.

Did you like Vanessa’s look?

Please share!
title: How To Get Vanessa Hudgens’ Hair In 4 Easy Steps

meta_data.description: Vanessa Hudgens looked beautiful yet she stayed true to her bohemian style during the 2015 VMAs. Here's how to style your hair just like her.
